definitions.definition: An avoirdupois ounce , weighing ⁄ 16 of an avoirdupois pound , or 28.349523125 grams .
A troy ounce , weighing ⁄ 12 of a troy pound , or 480 grains , or 31.1034768 grams.
A US fluid ounce , with a volume of ⁄ 16 of a US pint , 1.804688 cubic inches or 29.5735295625  millilitres.
A British imperial fluid ounce , with a volume of ⁄ 20 of an imperial pint , 1.733871 cubic inches or 28.4130625 millilitres.
( figurative ) Any small amount , a little bit .
examples: He didn't feel even an ounce of regret for his actions.

main_definition: An avoirdupois ounce , weighing ⁄ 16 of an avoirdupois pound , or 28.349523125 grams .
secondary_definitions: A troy ounce , weighing ⁄ 12 of a troy pound , or 480 grains , or 31.1034768 grams.
A US fluid ounce , with a volume of ⁄ 16 of a US pint , 1.804688 cubic inches or 29.5735295625  millilitres.
A British imperial fluid ounce , with a volume of ⁄ 20 of an imperial pint , 1.733871 cubic inches or 28.4130625 millilitres.
( figurative ) Any small amount , a little bit .

definitions.definition: A large wild feline , such as a lynx or cougar .
Synonym of snow leopard , Panthera uncia .
Synonym of onza , a particularly aggressive cougar or jaguarundi in Mexican folklore .

main_definition: ( archaic ) A large wild feline , such as a lynx or cougar . [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: Synonym of snow leopard , Panthera uncia . [from 18th c.]
( cryptozoology ) Synonym of onza , a particularly aggressive cougar or jaguarundi in Mexican folklore .
